title: Sell Macallan Fine & Rare
metaTitle: Sell Macallan Fine & Rare Collection | Vintage Scotch | Proof Cellars
metaDescription: Sell your Macallan Fine & Rare bottle. We offer confidential, high-value buyouts for this pinnacle Scotch whisky collection.
heroSubhead: Private acquisitions of Macallan Fine & Rare vintages.
introParagraph: The Fine & Rare Collection is the ultimate lineage of Macallan. Spanning vintages from the 1920s to the 1990s, these are investment-grade assets.
conditionFactors: Provenance: Authenticity is paramount. Original purchase receipt is highly desired.
Fill Level: Must be perfect for these values.
Wooden Box: The oak box is handmade. Damage to the box reduces value.
Label: The simple paper label must be pristine.
pricingFactors: Vintage: The older the vintage (e.g. 1946, 1950), the higher the value.
Age: A 50-year-old F&R is worth more than a 15-year-old F&R.
Cask: Sherry wood is the standard.
Market: Fine & Rare prices are globally tracked indices.

faqs.question: Do you buy the 1926?
faqs.answer: For ultra-high value bottles like the 1926, we arrange a specialized secure transaction. Contact us.

faqs.question: What about the 'Red Collection'?
faqs.answer: Yes, we buy the Red Collection (40, 50, 60, 71, 74, 78 Year Old).

faqs.question: Is the box required?
faqs.answer: Yes. A Fine & Rare bottle without its box and certificate is very difficult to sell.

faqs.question: Do you buy Lalique decanters?
faqs.answer: Yes, we buy the Six Pillars series and other Lalique releases.

faqs.question: Is this confidential?
faqs.answer: 100%. We regularly work with Family Offices and private collectors.
